img_text: If you could bring something entintt back to life, what would you thoose? Some dinosaurs, for sure. I'd love to ride a Megasoreass Who would play you in the film of your life? Michael Brunson. What is your guiltiest pleasure? I spend hundreds of euros a year on Austro-German I'm not such a fan of Klimt but I adore Dix. art What do you owe your parents? My mother's strength, my father's soft hands. He was a silent Vater, but a good Vater. To whom would yau most like to say sorry & uhi
